segments.text: Do we need to put on the jackets too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ d better , to protect your clothes . Now please watch your step .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Is the production line fully automated ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . How do you control the quality ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All products have to go through five checks in the whole manufacturing process .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One thousand units per month now . But we ’ ll be making 1,200 units beginning with October .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s your usual percentage of rejects ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s wonderful . Is that where the finished products come off ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Shall we take a break now ?
segments.speaker: S1
